name: Road to ElDoRando
description:
The Cool Cats present:

Road to El DoRando

dice is the name of the game in this sea faring narrative exploration game

your crew provides more dice to explore and navigate, collecting relics helps you find the way to El DoRando.

at the end of each round, roll your relic dice (1 for each relic collected) and try and get 6 6's to win the game before your crew perishes or your supplies run out

the cool cats are:

Wyld Stallionz

Wafflepan

Pantomime

Hungolomgononologonghous
